org.xlattice.corexml.expr

Class Numeric

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xlattice.corexml.expr.Expr
      • org.xlattice.corexml.expr.Numeric
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Token

    public class Numeric
extends Expr
implements Token
    A numeric token, a Double, one of XPath's fundamental data types. In evaluating XPath expressions, all numbers are converted to this type. Specifically, there is no XPath integer data type; all XPath numbers are objects in Java terms.
    Author:
    Jim Dixon
